module: Module-level comment: 'Test' is a testbench module set up for an interrupt controller 'top'. It defines inputs ('clk', 'reset', 'scan_in(0-4)', 'scan_enable', 'test_mode'), outputs ('scan_out(0-4)'), and provides initial conditions for 'top'. Normal or test mode operation is chosen based on 'scan_enable' and 'test_mode'. This module doesn't carry out any logic or processing tasks, rather it prepares conditions for testing the 'top' unit efficiently.
